name: I Believe in Capybara Supremacy!
description:
We are the chosen one to take care of Capybara, a one-of-a-kind creature that lives on Earth and has the potential to destroy the world when it gets angry, in order to help it control its anger and prevent the destruction of the world. We must spend time with Capybara to prevent its happiness level from going down. In order to keep it at the ideal level, you need to score as high as you can in the mini-games in the game, feed Capybara with food from the food stand when needed, and maintain her happiness level where it should be by constantly paying attention to its stamina and sleep bar. Try to overcome this challenging task that requires great responsibility!



Features
>Take your gaming experience to the next level with the easy to control FPS camera angle!
>With the money you earn from mini-games and other places, you can costume Capybara the way you want from dozens of options, change her color, and even change the place you are in to experience the game in a different atmosphere!
>To increase your Capybara's happiness level, you can pet it, make it dance, or even take it to the top with a ritual, a special event that you can do once a week in the game!
>Apart from the happiness bar, keep the levels of hunger, stamina and sleep under control. Give Capybara the food from the food stand as it needs it and keep it under control as it gets hungry faster and faster!
>4 different mini-games to entertain not only Capybara but also yourself! Get the highest score you can in mini-games that get faster and harder as you progress and help Capybara level up faster!
